subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: A group of activists is scrutinizing the Tour de France for hints of doping by comparing current performances with past ones. But the fairness of their methods has been questioned.
snippet: A group of activists is scrutinizing the Tour de France for hints of doping by comparing current performances with past ones. But the fairness of their methods has been questioned.
